author: Buddha
message: Just as a candle cannot burn without fire, men cannot live without a spiritual life.
title: Thought of the day

author: Mark Twain
message: A thing long expected takes the form of the unexpected when at last it comes.
title: Thought of the day

author: Benjamin Disraeli
message: Action may not always bring happiness; but there is no happiness without action.
title: Thought of the day

author: Oprah Winfrey
message: I don't believe in failure. It is not failure if you enjoyed the process.
title: Thought of the day
